data_description.latitude: Decimal degrees, e.g. 40.712 (3 decimal places is sufficient).
data_description.minutely_interval: How often to fetch minutely precipitation data (default: 600s). Lower values use more API calls. Each restart also triggers a fetch.
data_description.hourly_interval: How often to fetch hourly forecast data (default: 1800s). Lower values use more API calls. Each restart also triggers a fetch.
